channel.title: 🏢 Tel Aviv University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Tel Aviv University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Resolving Discrepancies in Compute-Optimal Scaling of Language Models
item.description: New research resolves discrepancies in language model scaling laws, revealing three key factors driving the differences and improving accuracy in predicting optimal model size based on compute budget.
